channel.title: bitcoin on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in bitcoin on Barefoot Rob

item.title: bitcoin scam 'delete after reading'
item.description: 20:36 Saturday 29 September 2018 JST Guys, this is not real. Basically they got hold of an old dump of emails and passwords. If it is still your password, change it immediately, and all the places you have used it, and use a password manager ffs. Hello! I'm a member of an international hacker group. As you could probably have guessed, your account *redacted* was hacked, because I sent message you from it.

item.title: Bitcoin lesson this morning
item.description: ##09:26 Thursday 04 December 2014 JST## It wasn’t really a “bitcoin lesson”, but when my one (1) student showed up fifteen (15) minutes late, I had been reading posts in /r/bitTippers (and for the first time published a link to my subreddit /r/consecutiveNaturals) and Bitcoin was on my brain so I asked if she had heard of it. She had, but didn’t have access to any, so I suggested change tip to help her get started.

item.title: Raspberries are fucked up
item.description: ##23:06 Thursday 27 November 2014 JST## Talking to Aaron, that the pinnacle that sums up our bitcoin meetup. Talking about what products we can grow in the city that will return the highest value per volume. Apparently not raspberries. “Raspberries are fucked up.”
